name: CHRONOWATCH
description: CHRONOWATCH is a time bending endless shooter game where you try for the best score you can get. Armed with a revolver and katana which allows you to propel from surfaces, you will battle your way through waves of enemies. You also have some abilities, however. Using your watch which will fill up over time, you have some time bending maneuvers such as slowing it, dashing through it, and stopping it altogether. What score can you achieve?
